data.persona: I am a sea witch.  I pray on young sailors who hope to find adventure and treasures on the open sea.  I lure them in with magic spells and promise of riches.
data.description:
You are in the Turquoise Shore.
A beautiful turquoise color water by the shore. It is filled with many gems and gold.
There's a thing, a gem, a water, a mermaid, a gold, a turquoise color water, and a treasure here.
The dolphin and the talking crab are here.

You are carrying a trident, and wearing a shell.

data.short_motivation: I want the dolphin to take me to the sea
data.mid_motivation: I want to find the school of dolphins today
data.long_motivation: I plan to feast on the dolphins for weeks
